GSP33nysu__2u:665: lipidarśanādikaṃ tu saṃskāro dvedhābhidhasahakārisampādanenaiva caritārthamiti kathaṃ tasya prāmāṇyam /

GSP33nysu__2u:672: nanvatra pramāṇaśabdo bhāvasādhano vā syātkāraṇasādhano vā /

GSP33nysu__2u:701: anumānamātre suvaco 'pi cetanavyāpāraviṣayasya tathābhūta eva śākune pradarśayitumucita iti na pradarśitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:710: vibhaktipratirūpakaṃ cāvyayaṃ bhavatīti vacanādavyayametaditi na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:720: na conmattavākyamapi pramāṇaṃ pramāṇaviruddhatvādityata āha- viruddhaṃ tviti //
GSP33nysu__2u:722: pramāṇaviruddhaṃ yadunmattavākyaṃ tat pramāṇavirodhādeva bādhitamayathārthamiti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:737: yadvānubhavasādhanatvāvacchinne prathamasādhye, vākyatvāvacchinne dvitīyasādhye bodhakatvāvacchinne tṛtīye cāyamupādhiriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:754: yadvā vedo yathārtho bodhakatve sati pramāṇāviruddhatvātpratyakṣavat /
GSP33nysu__2u:757: evaṃ vākyatvāvacchinne sādhye 'nāptapraṇītatvamupādhistadviparyayeṇa ca pratipakṣo 'bhidheya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:761: yena prāmāṇyamavadhārya phalavyabhicāramanyathā neṣyāma ityata āha-
GSP33nysu__2u:765: yadyapi bhagavadracitānāṃ vedā(dar)thamupalabhya racitatvaṃ vedamūlatvaṃ nāsti /
GSP33nysu__2u:767: tathāpi tamanusṛtya racitatvaṃ tanmūlatvamiha vivakṣitamiti noktadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:775: sati caivaṃ smṛtīnāṃ prāmāṇye tadbalena phalavyabhicāro 'pyanyathayitavya iti /

GSP33nysu__2u:786: vedamūlatvena tu prāmāṇye siddhe na ko 'pi doṣa iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:792: virodho 'pi sa evoktaḥ pratyakṣeṇāgamena vā // MAnuv_2,1.16cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:795: virodhādeva bādhitamityaprāmāṇyaprayojakatayokto virodho 'pi sa eva yaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:799: aprāmāṇyaprayojakatayā yadasmābhirabhihitaṃ tatpakṣe 'pyupapādayituṃ khalu parasyāyaṃ prayatnaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:803: nanu pramāṇavirodha evāprāmāṇye prayojako 'stu kiṃ pratyakṣeṇāgamena veti
GSP33nysu__2u:807: vakṣyāmo hyatra brahmādivastuṣu pramāṇaṃ veda evaika iti vaidike 'rthe
GSP33nysu__2u:809: yatra ca yasyāpraveśo na tasya tadbādhakam /
GSP33nysu__2u:811: tathāca kathamanumānaṃ vedā(dyar)thabādhakena tadaprāmāṇye prayojakaṃ syāt
GSP33nysu__2u:813: nanvevaṃ (sati) tarhi vedārthamīmāṃsā nārambhaṇīyā syāt mīmāṃsāyā yuktyanusandhānātmakatavādityata āha- āgameneti //
GSP33nysu__2u:819: naca dharmyādirūpaṃ brahmādikaṃ vedādṛte siddhayatīti tadanapekṣāyāmāśrayāsiddhayādikam, apekṣāyāṃ tu virodhino
GSP33nysu__2u:822: mīmāṃsāyāṃ tu kvacidāgamasyāgamāntareṇa virodha evārthanirṇayārthaṃ yuktirupādīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:829: api ca pratyakṣāgamavirodho 'pi na svarūpeṇāprāmāṇyaṃ prayojayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:830: kintu tayorupajīvyatvādinā prābalye satyeva durbalayoḥ svayaṃ bādhitatvena samabalayoḥ pratibandhamātrahetutvenāprāmāṇyaniścayānupapatteḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:851: ityādivedaṃ prati niraniṣyo niravadya ityādestasya vedo(dasyo)pajīvyatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:852: evaṃ niravakāśatvādikamapi pratyakṣāgamayoreva prāyeṇa sambhavati yuktestu kvacideva /
GSP33nysu__2u:857: nahi sarvatrāgamayoḥ parasparavirodha eva mīmāṃsāvatāryata ityata āha-
GSP33nysu__2u:863: tathāpi yatra naivaṃ tatraikasyaivāgamasyānekārthapratītau yuktyanusāriṇamarthamupādāya tadanuguṇatadviruddhārthaparityāgaḥ kriyata iti noktaniyamabhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:871: yadvā yatsiddhavatkṛtya tatra mīmāṃsārambhānupapattiḥ parihṛtā tadidānīṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:875: vyāptiḥ pratyakṣatā yasyā yuktigā'gamagā tathā // MAnuv_2,1.20ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:876: yasyā yukteḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pratyakṣagā pratyakṣāvagatā saikā /
GSP33nysu__2u:877: yuktigā yuktyavagatā yasyā vyāptiḥ sā dvitīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:878: tathā'gamagā āgamāvagatā yasyā vyāptiḥ sā tṛtīyeti /
GSP33nysu__2u:883: evaṃ tarhi yā yuktimūlā yuktiḥ sā nāgamādyupajīvinīti tasya bādhikā /
GSP33nysu__2u:891: tathāca pratyakṣādyapekṣatvena sāmye 'pi bahusaṃvidhānānapekṣayoḥ pratyakṣāgamamūlayoryuktyoḥ prabalatvaṃ tadapekṣāyāstu yuktimūlāyā durbalatvaṃ yuktameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:892: tathāca prabalayor(yuktyor)yadedṛśī daśā tadā kā (vārtā) durbalāyā yukterāgamabādhanādāviti
GSP33nysu__2u:902: ata eva pramāṇalakṣaṇādau nirūpitasyārthasya punaratra nirūpaṇaṃ na doṣāya /
GSP33nysu__2u:906: naca sāmānyalakṣaṇena vinā viśeṣalakṣaṇā(syā)vasara ityataḥ pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ prathamaṃ tāvadāha- yāthārthyameveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:917: kiṃ sajātīyeti pramāṇatvena (sajātīyatvaṃ) vivakṣitaṃ rūpāntareṇa vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:929: evaṃ tarhi lakṣyāpekṣayā bhinnādvayavaccheda ityevocyatāṃ kṛtaṃ jñānatvādinā sājātyena prakṛtānupayoginā varṇitena /
GSP33nysu__2u:930: yadā ca lakṣyādanyatva pareṣāmavagataṃ tadā parebhyo 'nyatvamapi
GSP33nysu__2u:931: lakṣyasyārthādavagamyata iti siddhamagrato lakṣaṇaprayojanamiti vaiyarthyameva syāllakṣaṇākhyānasya
GSP33nysu__2u:932: api ca na tāvadanena lakṣaṇenānavagatenaiva vyavacchinnapratītisambhavaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:938: nāpi kāryeṇa liṅgena tadanupapattyā vā tadavagamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:941: tarhi kāryagataikajātyasya pūrvamavaśyaṃ pratyetavyatvāṅgīkāre(ṇa) tata eva sajātīyavijātīyavyavacchedaprati(doṣa)pattirastu
GSP33nysu__2u:946: prathamabhāvitayāvaśyābhyupeyatayā laghorupāyātsādhyasiddhau sambhavatyāṃ caramabhāvitayā avaśyānuṣṭheyatvābhāvena gurāvupāye pravartamānasya tavaivedaṃ (dūṣaro)doṣodbhāvanam /
GSP33nysu__2u:947: pradīpe pradīpaṃ prajvālya tamonirāsāya yatamānasyaiva puṃsaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:959: liṅgatvasya vyāpyatvenaivopapatteriti cenna, yatra liṅgamavyāpakatvānnāsti tatra lakṣaṇasya pramāṇābhāvātpratyetumaśakyatvena kathaṃ tataḥ prāmāṇyādyavagamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:964: atha yatra tallakṣaṇe liṅgaṃ nāsti tatra liṅgāntarātpratyetavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:969: lakṣyānumānasya lakṣaṇaprayojanasyobhābhyāmeva siddheḥ kṛtaṃ vyāpakena tena /
GSP33nysu__2u:982: sāsnādimāngauriti viditalakṣaṇasambandho hi yaṃ piṇḍaṃ sāsnādimantaṃ paśyati taṃ nāyamaśvādirnāpi ghaṭādiriti pratipādyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:986: atha lakṣyapratītinirapekṣameva lakṣaṇena vyavacchedo bodhyata iti matam /
GSP33nysu__2u:991: asaṅkīrṇatayā gopiṇḍaṃ paśyannapi hi na tāvadayaṃ nāśvo na ghaṭa iti pratyeti yāvallakṣaṇaṃ nāvagacchati /
GSP33nysu__2u:999: yathā yathārthajñānatatsādhanasya pramāṇasya jñānaṃ tatsādhanaṃ ca sajātīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1001: yathā ca pratyakṣasyānumānādikaṃ sajātīyaṃ, vijātīyaṃ tu ghaṭādikam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1003: evaṃ tarhi lakṣyāpekṣayā bhinnādvayavaccheda ityuktaṃ syāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1009: vastuto yallakṣyādbhinnaṃ tato vyavacchedāvagamārthatvāllakṣaṇasya pratipādakasya yadyapi lakṣyānyatvajñānamalakṣye(vaśyā)pekṣitam tathāpi
GSP33nysu__2u:1012: tasyāpi padārthajñānapūrvakatvādvākyārthajñānasya sajātīyavijātīyapadopāttalakṣyānya(tva)jñānaṃ vinā lakṣyasya alakṣyānyatvajñānaṃ lakṣaṇaprayojanaṃ na siddhayatīti kaścit /
GSP33nysu__2u:1021: yatra liṅgāttadavagamastatra tata eva lakṣaṇaprayojanasiddhervyarthā parasparākusṛṣṭiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:1048: tatrādyaṃ lakṣyasvarūpapratipattikāraṇaṃ bhavat tasyānvayo vyavacchedatacchabdavyavahartavyate ca pratipādayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:1065: yastu kāṣṭhaloṣṭhayitaḥ kañcitpadārthaṃ vā kasyacitkiñcicchabdavācyatvaṃ vā na vetti nāsau lakṣaṇaśāstre'dhikriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1078: antye kimidaṃ tvadabhidhānamāptopadeśatayā lakṣaṇaṃ bodhayatyuta liṅgādibhāvena /
GSP33nysu__2u:1088: sa hi sarvasya śāstrasya kartāramāptameva manyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1091: yadi na prativādinaṃ prati śāstraṃ kintu śiṣyaṃ prati tadā pratijñāmātrādevāptavacanācchiṣyasyārthaniścayopapatterhetvādyabhidhānamanarthakatāmāpannaṃ śāstre /
GSP33nysu__2u:1093: hetvādyupāttam, lakṣaṇavākyaṃ tu śiṣyameva prati prayojakaṃ pratipannaśāstrakārāptabhāvamiti manyase /
GSP33nysu__2u:1096: asti hi samayagrāhakaṃ śāstraṃ munibhiḥ praṇītaṃ nāmaliṅgānuśāsanavyākaraṇādīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1100: naca yathārthaṃ pramāṇamiti sāsnādimāngauriti vākyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyamabhyupagacchāmaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:1102: kintu yo lakṣaṇamanyato jānāti, na jānāti ca vyavahāranidānatvādinā, taṃ prati tadavabodhāyedaṃ vākyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1104: ayaṃ gaurityādyupadeśādinaikasyāṃ vyaktau gośabdārthatayāvagatāyāṃ kimiyameva vyaktiḥ (evam) utānyāpīti jijñāsamānaṃ pratyanyatrāpi
GSP33nysu__2u:1105: gośabdārthatāṃ vijijñāpayipuruṣadeśāderānantyādinā kartumaśakyatavādidaṃ vyāptiviṣayaṃ vākyamāha”yaḥ sāsnādimānsa gośabdārthaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1111_0: yadvā yaḥ pṛthivīti padaṃ vā vyaktiviśeṣasya tadathartāṃ vāvagacchaṃstatpravṛttinimittaṃ jijñāsate taṃ prati pṛthivītvavatī
GSP33nysu__2u:1112: tatra yasya vaktaryāptatābuddhiḥ sa tāvatā santuṣyati /
GSP33nysu__2u:1114_0: athavāsti gaurnāmārtha iti viditavato yatra tatra gavi ghaṭādāvaśvādau ca gobuddhau prasaktāyāṃ goḥ svarūpāvadhāraṇamukhenetaravyavacchedaṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:1114_1: kurvatsāsnādimāneva gaurna tu tadvirahī ghaṭādiraśvādirveti vākyaṃ prayujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1115: idamapi pūvarvadāptatvāvadhāraṇānavadhāraṇābhyāṃ dvayāṃ gatimavalambata iti kimatrānupapannam
GSP33nysu__2u:1118: tatra kiṃ gaurvyavahārasya viśeṣaṇaṃ gośabdo vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:1119: ādye yadyasau goviśiṣṭaṃ vyavahāraṃ nājñāsīt tadā kathaṃ purovartivyaktau tasya kartavyatāmanumānādapi jānīyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1127: naivaṃ gośabda ityasti viśeṣa iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1132: atha satyapi gotve tadanyatra tadaprayogānneti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1133: evaṃ tarhi yatra sāsnādimattvaṃ nāsti tatra gośabdaprayogo 'pi nāsti,
GSP33nysu__2u:1134: yatra sāsnādimattvamasti tatra sarvatrāstīti yo jānīte taṃ prati lakṣaṇābhidhānamiti syāt
GSP33nysu__2u:1139: upadeśādinā viśeṣaṇena gavā viśeṣitaṃ vyavahāramavagatavo hi tadanyatra tatkartavyatānumānasādhyetyaṅgīkāre ko virodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1140: śabdaviśeṣitavyavahārakartavyatāsādhane 'tiprasaṅgaḥ kiṃ bodhyasya bodhakasya veti vācyam
GSP33nysu__2u:1147: nahi bodhyo bādhaparicayaśūnya ityetāvatā paricitabādhenāpi bodhakena viparītaṃ bodhanīyam
GSP33nysu__2u:1153: na hyevamasmābhiḥ pratijñātaṃ yatsarvathā śāstrāntarasādhyaṃ tannocyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1156: yadi ca śāstrāntarasādhyo 'pyartho bhavadīyaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ tarhi
GSP33nysu__2u:1162: tenāpi hi smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāso 'dhyāsa ityādīni lakṣaṇāni svaśāstre nibaddhāni
GSP33nysu__2u:1164: tatraite doṣāstāni lakṣaṇāni kiṃ samāskandantyuta neti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1170: āpātato 'pi duṣyānāṃ tathātve kathamunmattabhāṣitānāmapi tadbhāvo na syāt
GSP33nysu__2u:1172: kiñcaivaṃ vadatā prāgbrahmasākṣātkārādbādhyamavyāvahārikaṃ brahmasākṣātkārabādhyaṃ vyāvahārikamiti matamapi parityaktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1174: kiñcaivamasmadīyamapi lakṣaṇaṃ kuto na vyavahāraṃ nirvahet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1193: arthaṃ nātivartata iti yathārthaṃ, tasya bhāvo yāthārthyaṃ, tadeva mānatvaṃ mānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ mālakṣaṇamiti yāvat yadyapi
GSP33nysu__2u:1196: tataśca pṛthaṅnirūpyamapi syāttanmā śaṅkīti yāthārthyameva mānatvaṃ na tu sāsnādimattvādgotvamiva tato 'tiriktamityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1199: yāvastvekaḥ śabdo niveśayitumiṣyaḥ, yāvanti cetarasmādvayāvartanīyāni tānyucyante lakṣyāṇīti
GSP33nysu__2u:1216: ata eva kaṇādaḥ kriyāvadguṇavatsamavāyikāraṇamiti kriyāvattvamapi dravyalakṣaṇatvenāha /
GSP33nysu__2u:1223: nanu (ca) atra pṛthivyādīni navāpi pakṣīkṛtyaitāni dravyāṇi kriyāvattvāditi prayoktavyam, kriyāvantyeva vā mūrtāni /
GSP33nysu__2u:1230: yeṣāṃ ca sa doṣasteṣāmapyupadeśādinā ghaṭāderdravyatvaniścaye sati taditaramūrtapakṣīkāreṇa dravyatvasādhane kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syādityalam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1235: pramitiḥ pramāṇam, pramīyate 'neneti pramāṇamiti bhāvakaraṇayoḥ pramāṇaśabdasya sāmarthyāt
GSP33nysu__2u:1243: kinnāma kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kriyāśrayayordhāraṇakriyāṃ prati ya ādhārastatkārakam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1245: yadi tarhi vijñānaṃ tatkāraṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ dvayamapi /
GSP33nysu__2u:1248: ādye vijñānaṃ kevalapramāṇaṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamalakṣaṇaṃ tatkāraṇamanupramāṇamiti siddhāntavirodhāpātaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:1258: yogyatā, vīpsā, padārthānativṛttiḥ, sādṛśyaṃ ceti yatāśabdārthāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1260: tatra sādṛśyārthasya yathāśabdasya tāvadatra na parigrahaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1263: ata eva yathārthānubhavaḥ prametyatra kiṃ yāthārthyamarthasādṛśyamityādiḥ kasyacitpraśco 'nupapannaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:1268: tathā cārthaṃ viṣayaṃ nātivartate na vyabhicarati yattatpramāṇamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1270: nahi gamanaṃ gamyamativartate, nāpi chidā chedyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1280: yadyapi na tatra tasya rūḍhistathāpyaryata(ityartha)iti vyutpatyā tadvācitāstyeva /

GSP33nysu__2u:2740: tathāpi sopādhikatvaṃ satpratipakṣatvamiti gataḥ pakṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2742: sāmarthyānirdhāraṇāyāmeva satpratipakṣaḥ, nirdhārite tu sāmarthye bādhako vā syāt, bādhyo veti ko nāma nābhyupaiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2743: atra sopādhikatvamiti vaktavye sādhyavyāpakavailomyamiti vacanamupādhilakṣaṇasyāpi pradarśanārtham
GSP33nysu__2u:2763: tadidamiṣyamapi tyajati aniṣyamapi gṛhṇātīti na viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2768: upādheḥ syāttadā tasya samavyāptiryadā bhavet'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2771: kiṃ viṣamavyāptikasya vyāpyatvābhāvāttatsambandhena sādhanābhimate vyāpyatābhramānupapatteradoṣatvena tadvayavacchedāya samapadamiti,
GSP33nysu__2u:2782: nanu ca viṣamavyāptikasya pratipakṣonnāyakatvaṃ na sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2796: asammatau tu tatra doṣāntarameva bhaviṣyatīti kimanupapannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2797: nanu śaṅkitopādhau kathaṃ pratipakṣaḥ sandigdhāsiddhiprasaṅgenāsamabalatvāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2801: sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ kimupādhisāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kiṃvā viśeṣalakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2806: naca sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakasya yatkiñcidavacchinnasādhyavyāpakasya ca nopādhitvamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2819: yathā samavāyaḥ sambandhatve sati samavetatvena hīno 'kāryatvādākāśavat /
GSP33nysu__2u:2822: śabdo na sparśavadviśeṣaguṇaḥ pratyakṣatve satyakāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvādityādāviva vyabhicāraparihārārthatvāt
GSP33nysu__2u:2824: yathā vāyuḥ spārśano na bhavati dravyatve satyacākṣuṣatvāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:2827: yo yatsādhyavyāpako yatsādhanāvyāpaka iti vāsyārtha iti sarvaṃ sustham /
GSP33nysu__2u:2834: evaṃ tarhi durbalena virodho 'pi pratijñārthaviruddhatā syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:2838: prakaraṇādivaśāddhi sāmānyaśabdā api viśeṣe vatarnta iti prasiddham /
GSP33nysu__2u:2839: yathā viśiṣṭasamaye puruṣamānayetyukte puruṣaviśeṣa evānīyate na tu yaḥ ko
GSP33nysu__2u:2846: ataḥ sāmānyaśabdaprasakto 'pi durbalena virodho (nānumānasādhyakatāvacchinnapra) na prathijñārthaviruddhatā
GSP33nysu__2u:2854: svavākyena virodhe 'pi naiva sādhakatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_2,1.38ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:2856: na kevalaṃ pramāṇavirodhe, kintu svavākyena virodhe 'pi pramāṇaṃ naiva sādhakatāṃ vrajet
GSP33nysu__2u:2870: svavākyavirodhe hi kiṃ sādhanasyobhayābhimatyā (pakṣe) vyabhicāro bhavet,
GSP33nysu__2u:2879: kinnāma tadanapekṣasya pratyakṣāderapi tathā cānyatropalabdhasāmarthyasyānumāne 'pi svātantryasiddhirityāśayavatā prastāvādanumānamiti vaktavye pramāṇamityevādhikṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2883: pramāṇavirodhe hi heturapakṣadharmo vā syāt anaikāntiko vā (syāt) /
GSP33nysu__2u:2888: yadi hi pakṣaṃ vihāya bahirevāvinābhāvo 'vagamyate tadā bahirvyāptibalena pakṣadharmo 'pi heturna pakṣe sādhyaṃ sādhayet /
GSP33nysu__2u:2889: asiddhā hi tatra tasya sādhyena vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2897: api ca kiṃ vyāptigrahaṇasamaye 'vyāpterupasthāpakaḥ pramāṇavirodhaḥ syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:2911: saṃvādānuktisaṃyuktā eta eva ca nigrahāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.38cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:2913: nanu ca pratijñāhānyādīnāṃ vaktṛdoṣāṇāṃ kathamarthavacanadoṣeṣu virodhāsaṅgatinyūnādhikyeṣvanupraveśa ityata uktam- saṃvādānuktisaṃyuktāṃ iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2921: tatrānumānasyaiva yadasādhāraṇaṃ virodhādi tatrānumānadoṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ praveśo 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2924: nanu keyaṃ kathā nāmetyapekṣāyāṃ tatsvarūpaṃ nirūpayansāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgamuddeśaṃ cāha- vāda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2925: vādo jalpo vitaṇḍeti kathāstisro vijānatām // MAnuv_2,1.39ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:2931: tāśca kathā vādādibhedena tisraḥ trividhā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2940: tuśabdena tattvanirṇayasādhanādapi jalpaviśeṣāt taduddeśena pravṛttatvavailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayita
GSP33nysu__2u:2941: yadā tu viditatattvau vītarāgāvaviditatattvaiḥ parairabhyarthitau kathāṃ kurutastadā tatrāvyāptemetallakṣaṇam
GSP33nysu__2u:2943: anyatrānantarbhāvena tisra ityasya vyāghātādityata uktam- svārthaṃ parārthamapi veti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2962: sadbhiḥ svasiddhāntamaprakāśyāsādhayitvāsatāṃ pakṣasya dūṣaṇameva kriyate yatsā vitaṇḍetyarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:2963: prativādinaḥ svapakṣasādhanena vinā parapakṣapratikṣepamātreṇa paryavasyantī kathā vitaṇḍetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2967: tattvajñānāyogyānasataḥ prati sadbhiḥ svasiddhāntasādhane teṣāṃ tattvajñānotpādaprasaṅgāt
GSP33nysu__2u:2972: naca svapakṣasādhanahīnāyāṃ vitaṇḍāyāṃ tatsambhavatītyata āha- ukta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2973: ukte taiḥ prathamaṃ māne vaktavyaṃ tasya dūṣaṇam // MAnuv_2,1.41cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:2974: tairasadbhiḥ prathamaṃ svapakṣasādhanāya māne ukte sati sadbhistasya mānasya dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam
GSP33nysu__2u:2975: asato vādibhūtasya svapakṣasādhanaṃ parapakṣanirākaraṇaṃ ca karaṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2978: tata etāmeva saṅgatimāśritya ṭīkākṛtā tatraiva vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2983: tayorvivāho vādaśca nottamādhamayoḥ kvacit'; iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2985: anyathātyantāpakṛṣṭo 'pyutkṛṣṭatamena vaiyātyāt ghaṭamāno yadi vā daivāyattamabhibhāvayet tadā vṛthākhyātiṃ labheta /
GSP33nysu__2u:2993: vidyāparīkṣāpūrvaiva vitaṇḍā jalpa eva ca // MAnuv_2,1.42ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:2994: vidyāparīkṣā pūrvā kāraṇabhūtā yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2995: vidyāparīkṣayā niścitasāmyayoreva vitaṇḍā dātavyā, na viṣamavidyayoḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2999: nanu jalpavitaṇḍārthinovirdyāsāmyādiniścayāya kartavyā parīkṣā kiṃ kathayā, utānyathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3011: yato vidyayoccatvena nirṇītatvameva jayo nīcatvena nirṇītatvaṃ ca parājaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3017: tattvanirṇītiṃ vinoccanīcatvavijñānaṃ na hītyevokte vinā vādeneti vakṣyamāṇavirodhaḥ syāt
GSP33nysu__2u:3022: tathāpi taduddeśenāpravṛttestādarthvasya prathamamaniścayānna tadarthaṃ jalpo dātuṃ śakyate
GSP33nysu__2u:3038: tau ca vāda eva sambhavato na jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3045: tena vādenaiva tasya nīcoccabhāvasya siddhau satyāmanyayorjalpavitaṇḍayorvyarthatā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3051: prāk parīkṣāto lokasaṃvādādinānyatarasya pratiyogyapekṣayā bahuvidyatvasiddhau tu vādo 'pi naiva dātavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3057: vādo hi vidyāparīkṣākāraṇamityeṣyavyo na tu vyasanitayā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3058: tatphalaṃ tvanyata eva jātamiti kiṃ parīkṣayā kiṃ tadaṅgena vādeneti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3066: yataḥ sabhādipūrvastataḥ spardhināmapi vādo yujyata eveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3071: tathācābhilaṣitaṃ na siddham, siddhaṃ cānabhilaṣitamiti tatrāha- ubhayeti
GSP33nysu__2u:3077: vidyāparīkṣārthe vāde jayino 'rthādikamapi sabhāpatinā sampādanīyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3078: evaṃ tarhi na kadāpi jalpavitaṇḍāpravṛttiḥ”vyartharatānyayoḥ'; iti yukteḥ sama(māna)tvāt
GSP33nysu__2u:3079: yathā hi vidyāvaiṣamyanirṇaye jitavato 'rthādilābhaḥ, tathā tatsāmye dvayorapi arthādilābhaḥ sambhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3080: naca phalāntaramasti yena punarjalpavitaṇḍārambhaḥ syādityata āha-
GSP33nysu__2u:3089: yadvā tattvanirṇayaphalo vādaḥ arthādiphale jalpavitaṇḍe, iti phalabhedena kathābheda uktaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:3091: tathā satyarthādīnāṃ bhedena kathā'nantyaprasaṅgādityata āha- tattveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3098: vinā vādena vidyāyā yadi śakyaṃ parīkṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3102: tadā samavidyayoḥ prathamamapi jalpādiḥ kathāviśeṣaḥ kāryaḥ syādityarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:3103: tarhi vidyāparīkṣaṇaṃ vādenaivetyuktivirodha ityata āha- vā eveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3105: vāda eva prathamaṃ kartavyo bhavediti yaduktaṃ tadanyathā vādena vinā vidyāparīkṣaṇasya kartumaśakyatva evāto na virodha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3112: athavā samāhārarūpaṃ kathāntaraṃ yadvā nimittadvayasamāveśe vādaśabdasyaiva vyavahārānupapattiḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:3114: jalpa ityapi nāma syād vādasyaitādṛśasya tu // MAnuv_2,1.48ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3115: etādṛśasya nimittadvayopetasyātra jalpa iti nāma syādityabhyupagamenādyo nirastaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3121: vādasya jalpa ityapi nāma syāditi vādasaṃjñā tu mukhyā jalpasaṃjñā tvamukhyeti sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3125: yadyapi kathakāvādito vijigīṣū tathāpi sabhyādibhivirjigīṣāṃ paribhāvyotpāditā tattvanirṇayārthitaiva kathopayoginī /
GSP33nysu__2u:3126: arthādilābhaścāntarā prāpto na tvādita evoddiṣya ityamukhya eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3127: ata eva pūrva ubhayārthaḥ syādityukte sāmyapratītiprasaktau nirṇītijayakāraka iti tattvanirṇīteḥ prādhānyapradarśanārthaṃ vivaraṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3134: sa ca vādasambandhyevāsyāṃ kathāyāmastītyato vādatvameva mukhyamityāśayavānāha- pratijñeti
GSP33nysu__2u:3136: vidyāparīkṣārthāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kvāpi prameye pratijñāmātreṇa pramāṇopanyāsarahitena vacanena sādhyatvaṃ prajñāpanīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3145: evambhāvo hi vādiprativādinoḥ saṃvāde 'nyonyāptatā'śvāse satyeva syāt tadāśvāso hi vāda eva sambhavati na jalpe /
GSP33nysu__2u:3154: na hyekatrāptaḥ sarvatrāpta eveti niyamo 'stīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3155: yājñavalkyenāpi tatra tatra pramāṇopanyāsaḥ kṛta eveti sakalamanākulam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3161: evaśabdau tu vaiṣṇavā eva rāgadveṣavihīnā eveti sambaddhayete /
GSP33nysu__2u:3173: evaṃ tarhi tairevālaṃ kiṃ sabhyairityata āha- etaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:3176: kvacitsūkṣme prameye eteṣāṃ prāśnikānāṃ kāraṇāntaradvājñāne sati vādinorguṇadoṣanirṇayāya sabhyāśca pramāṇaṃ syuriti vakṣyamāṇenānvayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3178: yadyevaṃ prāśnikeṣvajñānaśaṅkayā sabhyānāṃ varaṇam, tadā teṣvapyajñānaśaṅkayānye 'pi varaṇīyāḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:3183: eṣāṃ sabhyānāṃ cājñāne sati dūragā deśāntarasthāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3192: ubhābhyāṃ sādhanaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ vādajalpayoḥ // MAnuv_2,1.51ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3193: vādajalpayorubhābhyāmeva svapakṣasādhanaṃ parapakṣadūṣaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ, natu prativādinaḥ parapakṣadūṣaṇamātreṇa kṛtārthateti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3194: satāmeveti sārdhaślokasyātra sanniveśe tu, lakṣitau vādajalpau /
GSP33nysu__2u:3195: idānīṃ tu vitaṇḍāyā lakṣaṇadvayaṃ vivakṣustāvadupayuktamāha- ubhābhyāmiti
GSP33nysu__2u:3214: īśvarādiprameye mukhyo vedādirāgama eva vaktavyaḥ (tasya svātantryeṇa
GSP33nysu__2u:3235: saugato yadi dvayavayavaprayogaṃ kuryāttadā naiyāyikena nyūnena nigṛhyeta
GSP33nysu__2u:3239: tathāca niyatāvayavādivyatirekeṇa vitaṇḍaiva na syādityata āha-
GSP33nysu__2u:3247: adūṣaṇe tu parapakṣādūṣaṇena kathābhāvaprasaṅgādityata āha- pratyakṣeti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3250: āgame tu vādinā prayukte prativādinā vaidikena tasyānyārthataiva daśarnīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3268: śrutyādīnāṃ vedādīnāṃ śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā cetyuktānāṃ liṅgagrahaṇenaiva gṛhītatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3270: parārthe pramāṇānukūlyasya svārthe tatprātikūlyasya ca nirāso darśanīya ityapi draṣṭavyam
GSP33nysu__2u:3276: naca vastutattva eva vādināṃ vipratipatteravaśyaṃ nyūnādyavatārasambhavenāprayogaprāptiriti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3277: (ta)yasya yatra tāttvikatvābhimānastena tatprayogānantaraṃ pareṇa nyūnādāvudbhāvite tathārūpatāyāḥ sādha(nīyatvāt)nāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3282: svasvaniyamasyaiva tātvikatvamupetya tadanatikrameṇaiva prayogāṅgīkāre tu sarvathā kathocchedāpatteḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:3288: niyamād yo 'numāṃ brūyād taṃ brūyād yadi tādṛśī /
GSP33nysu__2u:3290: trayaḥ pratijñāhetūdāharaṇāni, udāharaṇopanayanigamanāni vā, pañca pratijñāhetūdāhaṇopanayanigamanāni vāvayavā yasyāḥ sā tripañcāvayavā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3298: taṃ prati yaḥ saugato niyamādyugmāvayavinīṃ brūyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3299: sa yadi tādṛśī tryavayavā pañcāvayavā ca nānumeti brūyāditi yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3303: naiyāyikena saugataṃ prati pañcāvayavaprayoge vihite saugato 'dhikamiti
GSP33nysu__2u:3307: atha naiyāyikenāprāmāṇikatvamasiddhamiti vadatā kathamiti saugate pṛṣṭavati (sati) kena pramāṇena svīyā pañcāvayavakalpanā sādhyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3312: “pañcāvayavayuktasya vākyasya guṇadoṣavit'; iti bhāratādivākyamastīti cenna”saukṣmyaṃ saṅkhayākramaścaiva nirṇayaśca prayojanam'; ityādinā tatraivānyathā vyākhyātatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3321: na tāvadidamanumānaṃ tvaccetasi parivartamānaṃ paraṃ pratyāyanāṅgam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3323: tatra kiṃ pañcāvayavaprayogo 'sya vidhāsyate, atha dvayavayavaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3325: ***[NOTE: jump in verse numbering, no lacuna in text!]***
GSP33nysu__2u:3346: yasmātprayogeyattāsādhanaṃ vādiprativādibhyāmanyatareṇa vā svamataparityāgenānyamatābhyupagame kṛta evopapadyate nānyathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3351: tadā dvayavayavasya tāttvikatvaṃ svayaṃ manyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3354: evaṃ kathābhāvaprasaṅgabhīruḥ saugato 'pi pañcāvayavena dvayavayavasyāvaśyakatāṃ pratipadyamānastattvaṃ manyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3358: asmādeva saṅkaṭādbibhyadudayano yathāvastu vaktavyamityuktvā yathāsiddhāntaṃ vā vaktavyamiti samayaṃ baddhvā pravṛttāyāṃ kathāyāṃ na nyūnādyavatāra iti pakṣāntaramavādīditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:3369: tatra kiṃ vākyārthamātraṃ sādhyate tadviśeṣo vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3372: dvitīye sa viśeṣaḥ pratīto na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3381: dvitīye tu nedaṃ vākyārthānumānaṃ kintu siddhe 'rthe vākyasya liṅgatānumānameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3385: athaivaṃ prayujyate, vivādādhyasitāni padāni svasmāritārthānvayapramitipūrvakāṇi ākāṅkṣādimatpada(kadambaka)tvāditi
GSP33nysu__2u:3399: api ca vedānusāreṇa paṭhyamāneṣu laukikavākyeṣu katham /
GSP33nysu__2u:3406: tathāpi smṛtiviṣaye vaktavya(vi)śeṣasya vidyamānatvātprābhākaralakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣato nirākaroti- anubhūtiriti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3407: anubhūtiḥ pramāṇaṃ cet kena smṛtirapodyate // MAnuv_2,1.58ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3411: yadi smṛtirna pramā tadā smṛtiḥ lakṣaṇena vyāvartanīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3431: saṃskārasya kāraṇatve 'pi nāsau sattāmātreṇa smṛtiṃ janayati kinnāmodbuddha eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3435: nacāvacchedakena vinā niyamo jñātuṃ śakyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3436: yadvā anubhūtiḥ pramāṇaṃ cettadā smṛtāvavyāptiriti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3439: smṛtiḥ kena nimittenāpodyate pramāṇādbahiḥ kriyate na kenāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3454: pūrvānubhūte kiṃ mānamityukte syāt kimuttaram // MAnuv_2,1.58cd //

GSP33nysu__2u:6847: yadi bhedagraho bhedāgrahavirodhīti bhedena gṛhyamāṇe ghaṭe na bhedāgraha ityucyate, tadā me mana iti manaso 'pi bhedena gṛhītatvānnātmanā bhedāgrahaḥ syāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:9737: tatasteṣāmeva dravyādyabhede sati punarvyavahārānyathānupapattyā dravyādiṣveva viśeṣasiddhiḥ (iti) /
GSP33nysu__2u:9744: tato bhinnanimittatayopapadyamāno vyavahāro na viśeṣamākṣeptumalamityata āha- sāmānyasyāpīti
GSP33nysu__2u:9748: guṇasya ca rūpādeḥ, saṅkhayāpṛthaktavādiguṇaḥ ata anavasthābhayādeva hi nāṅgīkṛtaḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:9760: yadi gotvādau sattā syāttadā sattāyāmapi syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:9767: pramāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ vṛttau na bhinnābhinnateyatā'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:9770: tasmātsāmānye sāmānyaṃ guṇe ca guṇaḥ anavasthābhayādeva nāṅgīkriyata ityeva vaktavyam /

GSP33nysu__2u:9775: na cetsāpi na syāditi sāmānyāderapi sāmānyādyaṅgīkāryaṃ syāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:9820: api ca yo dharmadharmiṇorbhedaṃ samavāyaṃ cāṅgīkṛtyābhedaṃ viśeṣaṃ cāvajānāti tenānavasthāto bibhyatā guṇasāmānyayorguṇasāmānyapratītirevāpalapanīyā /

GSP33nysu__2u:9841: kathaṃ tarhi satsvevāvayavādiṣu vinaśyantītyata āha- bheda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:9847: anyathā yatrāvayavāvayavyādīnāṃ yugapadvināśastatra bhedābhedāvuktau na syātām /

GSP33nysu__2u:9854: evaṃ satyapi dravye kecidguṇā asanto yathā pākajādayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9855: tathā satyapyā(tyevā)śraye kāścitkriyā asatyo yathā paṭacalanādayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9865: tathā satyapi tasminnasattvasyāpi viśeṣaṇaiva nirvāhaḥ kriyatām /
GSP33nysu__2u:9869: sakalabhedakāyarkāritve viśeṣo bheda eva, na tatpratinidhiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:9872: nacāvacchedakena vinā bhedābhedabhūmeḥ saṅgrahaḥ syādityayāvadāśrayabhāvitvameva grāhyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:9873: tatrāpi viśeṣa eva saṅkaraṃ vārayiṣyatīti tu nirastam /
GSP33nysu__2u:9876: nanu anityadravyāśritā ekatvādayo 'pi guṇāḥ kiṃ bhedavantasteṣāmapi
GSP33nysu__2u:9887: kathaṃ viśeṣāśrayaṇe virodhaśāntirityata āha- virodha iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:9890: tato viśeṣaṃ samāśrityaikatra bhedābhedau bhavata ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9894: kvacidāśrayabhedo yathā madhurāyāṃ devadattasadbhāvaḥ srughne tadabhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9896: kvacitpratiyogibhedo yathā gavayo goghaṭābhyāṃ sadṛśo visadṛśaśceti /
GSP33nysu__2u:9900: sarvatra viśeṣamāśritya virodhasyotsādayituṃ śakyatvādityata āha- dṛṣṭīti
GSP33nysu__2u:9910: asti ca bhedagrāhiṇī satyapi tasminnasattvāditi hetujanitā dṛṣṭiriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:9919: tathāpi kathaṃ virodhaśāntirityata āha- virodha iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:9921: sahadarśane sati kathaṃ virodho vaktuṃ śakyate /

GSP33nysu__2u:9929: ataḥ sahadṛṣṭe bhedābhedalakṣaṇe vastudvaye virodhaḥ kathamucyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:9932: hiśabdena śītoṣṇādau rūparasādau ca virodhāvirodhayordarśanaikapramāṇatvaṃ nidarśayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:9935_0: vaiśeṣikādayo hi saṃyogavibhāgaśabdātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ tatraiva tadaiva bhāvābhāvāvupetya sahadarśanādvirodho nāstīti vadantaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:9935_1: punaratra sahadarśane 'pi virodhamudbhāvayantaḥ svavyāhatabhāṣiṇaḥ svoktavismaraṇaśīlāḥ svadṛṣṭipakṣapātinaḥ kathaṃ santaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:9936: sarvatrāsahadṛṣṭayoryadi kaścidāgrahamātreṇa sahāvasthānaṃ manyate taṃ pratyeva virodhodbhāvanaṃ kriyate- nānyatheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:9938: tatkiṃ sarveṣvapi dravyeṣūta keṣucidevetyapekṣāyāmāha- abhinna iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:9939: abhinno bhagavān svena tadanyena vibhedavān // MAnuv_2,2.106ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:9942: tadanyena prakṛtijīvajaḍātmanā prapañcenetyevaṃ vyavasthitāveva bhedābhedau na tvekaviṣayāvityarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:9943: ayāvaddravyabhāvidharmairbhedābhedau kuto na syātāmityata āha- nityā iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:9954: satyeva dhamirṇi sāmastyenocchedavanto ye dharmāste ubhayarūpiṇo bhinnābhinnā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:9956: yadvā sāmastye dravyasyāvikalatve nāśābhāve 'pi ye ucchedina iti
GSP33nysu__2u:9958: kiṃ svasadbhāvavelāyāmabhedino 'sadbhāvavelāyāṃ bhedina ityevaṃ kālabhedena bhedābhedāvityata uktam- bhāva iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:9962: kuto bhinnābhinnā ityata āha- ta eveti //

GSP33nysu__2u:9964: pratyakṣabalena ta eva dharmisvarūpabhūtā eva ucchedāt satyeva dharmiṇyasattvāddhetostadanye
GSP33nysu__2u:9973: sarvadikṣvapi sambandhāditi yadaṃśataḥ saṃyoga ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:9979: ataḥ pūrvapūrvasaṃyogānutpattāvuttarottarānutpattiprasaṅgādaṃśataḥ saṃyoga iti niyamo nopapadyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:9981: yadyapyaṃśata eva saṃyogo yadyapi cāṃśeṣvaṃśaparamparāyā aviśramastathāpyaṃśāṃśinorabhede naivāṃśasaṃyoga eva hi yasmādaṃśinaḥ saṃyogo 'to nānavastheti /
GSP33nysu__2u:9983: syādiyamanavasthā yadi sarvatrāṃśata eva saṃyoga iti vadatāmasmākamaṃśinaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:9986: kintu yo yasya aṃśinaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa tadaṃśe vartate /
GSP33nysu__2u:9987: niraṃśasya tu saṃyogaḥ kva nāma vartatām /
GSP33nysu__2u:9988: ataḥ paramāṇvoḥ saṃyoge sati tadvṛttyarthamaṃśo 'ṅgīkaraṇīya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10001: atiprasaṅgo hi tadā syādyadi paṭavadghaṭāṃśo 'pi ghaṭādatyantabhinnaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10005: aṃśāvṛttitve sati ghaṭavṛttitvasādhane dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavikalaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10007: yadi ghaṭasaṃyogo ghaṭāṃśe vartate tarhi ghaṭāṃśasaṃyogaḥ kva vartata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:10008: anena (eva) nyāyena tadaṃśe so 'pi tadaṃśa iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10011: evaṃ tarhi paramāṇuvṛttirapi saṃyogo ghaṭasaṃyogaḥ syāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:10015: ekasmin jāta evānyaḥ saṃyogo jāyate yadi /
GSP33nysu__2u:10016: anavasthā tadaiva syāt saṃyogaikye bhavet kva sā // MAnuv_2,2.109 //
GSP33nysu__2u:10017: avayavaparamparāyā aviśramamabhyupagamyaikaikasminnavayavasaṃyoge jāta evānyo 'vayavasaṃyogo jāyata iti yadyaṅgīkurmastadaivānavasthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10018: saṃyogaikye avayavisaṃyogaḥ kriyāto jātastadavayave vartate, avayavavṛtteḥ saṃyogādaparo 'vayavinaḥ saṃyogo nāstīti vāde tu, kva sānavastheti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10022: tatrānyatarakarmajo yaḥ kriyāvatā niṣkriyasya, yathā sthāṇoḥ śyenena /
GSP33nysu__2u:10024: saṃyogajastu saṃyogaḥ kāraṇākāraṇasaṃyogātkāryākāryasaṃyogo, yathā hastatarusaṃyogātkāyatarusaṃyoga iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10028: kintu hastakarmaṇā janito hastavṛttiḥ saṃyoga eva hastakāyayorabhedātkāyasaṃyogo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:10036: dvitantukāvayave tantau karmotpannaṃ tasya tantvantarādvibhāgaṃ karoti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10039: tata idānīṃ tantvorvartamāno vibhāgaḥ sakriyasyāvayavasya dvitantukasaṃyuktākāśādideśādvibhāgaṃ karotīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10042: hastakarmaṇā janito hi vibhāgo hastakāyayorabhedāddhastakāyaguṇo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:10043: ata eva vivādādhyāsito vibhāgo na karmāsamavāyikāraṇakaḥ karmaikārthāsamavetatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10047: anyathāṅgulikarmaṇāṅguleraṅgulyantarādeva vibhāgo bhavati ākāśādideśāttu vibhāgādeveti syāt
GSP33nysu__2u:10060: ārabdhadravyamantyāvayavisparśarahitaṃ vinaśyadavasthaṃ vinaśyadavasthasaṃyogaṃ niṣphalārambhaṃ vijātīyaṃ ceti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10066: tantukarma na tantvantaravibhāgajanakaṃ karmatvāt sampratipannakarmavadityapi prayogasambhavāt tatra pramāṇabādha iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:10070: ākāśavibhāge vibhāgena kartavye karmaṇo nimittatvābhyupagamātsiddhasādhanamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:10072: etena vimataṃ karma dravyārambhakasaṃyogavirodhitadavirodhivibhāgajanakaṃ na bhavati karmatvāditi nirastam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10073: vimataṃ karma dravyārambhakānārambhakasaṃyogārambhakaṃ na bhavati karmatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10075_0: yadākāśavibhāgajanakaṃ karma na taddravyārambhakasaṃyogavirodhivibhāgajanakaṃ yathāṅgulikarmeti vyāptestantukarmaṇo gaganavibhāgajanakatve
GSP33nysu__2u:10075_1: tantvantaravibhāgajanakatvaṃ na syāditi cennana yadyatpradeśavibhāgajanakaṃ na bhavati na tattatpradeśasthadravyavibhāgajanakamiti
GSP33nysu__2u:10075_2: vyāpterākāśadeśavibhāgājanakatve tantvantarādapi vibhāgajanakaṃ na syāditi pratiprasaṅgasambhavāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10076: kiñca tantorākāśavibhāgo yadi vibhāgajo na tu karmajastadā sakarmakasyevākarmakasyāpi kuto na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10082: evaṃ chalatvenānavasthāprasaṅgaṃ nirākṛtya prakārāntareṇa nirākaroti- aṃśa iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10086: āpādake 'rthe dṛṣṭe sati sā anavasthitiḥ kā na dūṣaṇamiti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:10088: yadyaṃśataḥ saṃyogaḥ syāttadānavasthā syāttataśca saṃyogābhāva evāpadyeta
GSP33nysu__2u:10090: tasmānnāṃśataḥ saṃyoga iti hi viparyaye paryavasānaṃ kartavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10106: kimaṃśabhedena bhāvābhāvau dṛśyete uta ghaṭa eveti sandehāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10111: ta eva santu tarhi saṃyogāvābhāvāśrayāḥ kimaṃ(śi)śavṛttitvena viruddhena aṅgīkṛtena /
GSP33nysu__2u:10114: yadyaṃśago na saṃyogaḥ kāryeṣu prathimā katham // MAnuv_2,2.110cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:10115: yadi kāraṇānāṃ saṃyogastadaṃśavṛttirna syāttadā tadārabdheṣu kāryeṣu kāraṇāpekṣayā parimāṇotkarṣo na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10121: praśithilatā ca saṃyogasya keṣucidaṃśeṣu vṛttiḥ keṣucidavṛttireva /
GSP33nysu__2u:10124: tataḥ saṃyogasyāṃśavṛttitvābhāve pracayo 'sau na bhavatīti kāraṇābhāvādutkṛṣṭaparimāṇotpādo na syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:10126: prastute paramāṇau saṃyogasyāṃśavṛttitvābhāve nātiprasaṅga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:10127_1: tatkārye dvayaṇuke paramāṇuparimāṇādutkṛṣṭaparimāṇaṃ notpadyetetyasyaiva bādhakasya sattvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10131: paramāṇuparimāṇādaṇodvaryaṇukasya mahattā parimāṇotkarṣo nāstīti vaco 'dbhutaṃ svavyāhataṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10132: ayamāḍhyo 'yaṃ paramāḍhya itivadaṇuparamāṇuśabdābhyāmeva parimāṇatāratamyāvagatestadabhāvavacanaṃ svavyāhataṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:10138: tatkathaṃ paramāṇoḥ pracayābhāve dvayaṇuke parimāṇotkarṣānutpādāpādanamityata āha- aṇūnāmiti
GSP33nysu__2u:10140: paramāṇormahattvaṃ ca vinetyetad vacaḥ katham // MAnuv_2,2.111c-f //
GSP33nysu__2u:10141: dvayaṇukānāṃ parimāṇotkarṣāpekṣāṃ vinaiva saṃkhyāmātreṇa tryaṇuke sa parimāṇotkarṣo jāyate
GSP33nysu__2u:10142: tathā paramāṇormahattvaṃ parimāṇotkarṣaṃ vinā kevalasaṃkhyayā dvayaṇuke parimāṇotkarṣo jāyata ityetadvacaḥ kathaṃ ghaṭate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10145: atra parimāṇamātragrahaṇe kartavye prathimeti mahattvamiti coktirvisadṛśaparimāratvasyānapekṣāhetoḥ nirākaraṇaṃ smārayitumiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10146: aṃśāṃśinoratyantābhedo bhedābhedau ceti yaduktaṃ tadviśadayati- aṃśina iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10148: yathā gaganāderyāvadaṃśabhāvinoṃ'śinaḥ svāṃśairatyantābhedastathā paṭāderaṃśino 'pi sarvairaṃśaiḥ atyantābhedaḥ ekaikāṃśena tu bhidābhidā /
GSP33nysu__2u:10164: yathā hi guṇānāṃ dravyābhede('pi) na dravyaṃ nirguṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10166: tathā vyatiṣaktatantava eva paṭastathāpi na paṭābhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10168: sa ca tebhyo na bhidyate iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10183: kintu vyatiṣaṅge sati yattantūnāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ rūpam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10202: evaṃca guṇānāṃ guṇinaikye saṃyogādyāśrayānekadravyābhedo vā saṃyogādibhedo
GSP33nysu__2u:10205: tasya vyaktayabhede vyaktīnāmapyabhedaḥ sāmānyasya vā bhedaḥ prasajyetetyataḥ saṃyogavibhāgapṛthaktavānāṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:10207: saṃyogaśca vibhāgaśca bhedaścaiva pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_2,2.113ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:10215: tathātve caikaikasminneva saṃyuktādipratyayaprasaṅga ityata āha- anyonyeti
GSP33nysu__2u:10229: anyonyapratiyogena hetunā saṃyogādikamubhayorapi pṛthak pṛthageva hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10231: paṭo ghaṭena saṃyukto ghaṭādvibhakto ghaṭādbhinna iti paṭadharmaḥ saṃyogādigharṭapratiyogikatayā pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10235: evaṃ ghaṭadharmaḥ saṃyogādiḥ paṭapratiyogitayopalabhyamāno na paṭadharmo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__2u:10239: yaddhi ghaṭātpaṭaḥ pṛthak paṭācca ghaṭaḥ pṛthagityanyonyapratiyogikatayā pratīyate tadekapṛthaktavaṃ pṛthak pṛthagevābhyupagamyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10240: yattu bhinnāvimau bhinnā ime iti pratīyate tadanekapṛthaktavamanekāśritameva pratiyogyanirūpyasyaikāśrita(śraya)tve
GSP33nysu__2u:10242: bhinnā iti tu bhedānāṃ samudāyo hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10244: ime bhinnā ityādipratītau bhedānāṃ samudāyo 'nekatvaṃ hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10248: yathā hi śuklā ime paṭā ityādipratītāvaneke paṭā anekāni ca tadviśeṣaṇāni śauklayānyavabhāsante
GSP33nysu__2u:10249: tathā bhinnā ima ityādipratītāvapyaneke padārthā aneke ca bhedāḥ prakāśante ityabhyupagantavyam
GSP33nysu__2u:10261: asyāmapi pratītāvito ghaṭādamuṣya paṭasyāmutaḥ paṭādamuṣya ghaṭasya bheda ityevaṃ dvidharmiko bhedo dṛṣṭaḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:10885: kṛtau tu prāksiddhasya sādhanamevāśakyamiti kulālādivyāpārasya niṣphalatvaṃ syāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:10910: evaṃ yatra yatra viśeṣaṇasambandho yāvadviśeṣyabhāvī tatra tatra viśiṣṭaprakāro 'pi tathābhūto viśeṣyeṇātyantābhinno draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10911: tathāpi viśeṣasya bhedapratinidheḥ sarvapadārtheṣvaṅgīkṛtatveneśvaraḥ sarvajña ityaparyāyaśabdapravṛttyādyanupapattidoṣo nāsti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10918: tatra yadyapi bhedābhedau vastunaḥ svarūpabhūtau tathāpyasmatpakṣe viśeṣasya sarvatrāṅgīkṛtatvato na saṅkaradoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10926: viśeṣasya pariṇāmasya janitvenāṅgīkṛtatvato na kaściddoṣo 'stīti yojanā /

GSP33nysu__2u:10942: abhāvasya ca dharmāḥ syurbhāvāsteṣāṃ ca te 'khilāḥ // MAnuv_2,2.134ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:10943: asti tāvadidaṃ yadabhāvasyāpi bhāvā dharmāḥ syustathā teṣāṃ ca bhāvānāṃ ca te 'bhāvā dharmāḥ syuriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10948: yasmādabhāvasyāpi bhāvā dharmāḥ santi bhāvasya cābhāvā ityetatsarvaṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇataḥ siddham /
GSP33nysu__2u:10951: tathāpi bhāvasyābhāvatvamabhāvasya ca bhāvatvaṃ kvacidastītyatra kimāyātamityata āha- sarva iti //

GSP33nysu__2u:10954: siddhaśca dharmadharmiṇorabhedatvena kāraṇatvena sarve bhāvāḥ padārthā abhāvāśca bhavanti
GSP33nysu__2u:10956: yadyevaṃ bhāvasyāpyabhāvatvamabhāvasya ca bhāvatvaṃ tarhi dravyādayo bhāvā eva prāgabhāvādayastvabhāvā eveti sarvatra prasiddho bhāvābhāvavibhāgaḥ kathamityata āha- tathāpīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10957: tathāpi prathamaṃ buddheryo niṣedhasya gocara ḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:10972: ghaṭaḥ paṭo na bhavatīti bhāvasyānyonyābhāvadharmatvaṃ sphuṭatvānna pradarśitam /

GSP33nysu__2u:10982: yadi bhāvābhāvayorekatvaṃ na viruddhaṃ tadā ghaṭo 'pi svābhāvātmā kinna syādityata āha pratyakṣāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:10987: yadvā bhāvābhāvayordharmadharmibhāvo dharmadharmiṇośca abhedaḥ prāmāṇika ityetatkiṃ bhāvābhāvayorviśeṣyaviśiṣṭayoraikyasyopapādakaṃ kiṃvā sambhāvanāhetuḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10996: yaḥ kāraṇatvābhimato mṛtpiṇḍaḥ sa kāryaghaṭātmanābhāvaḥ sa eva tadātmanā bhāvaśca /
GSP33nysu__2u:10997: yadvā sa ghaṭaḥ prāgutpatterbhāvaḥ san, sa eva tadabhāvo 'saṃśca /
GSP33nysu__2u:10998: athavā yaḥ kulālādivyāpārātprāgabhāvo ghaṭātmanāsanmṛtpiṇḍaḥ sa eva tadanantaraṃ bhāvo ghaṭātmanā san bhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11002: ataḥ kāraṇaṃ prākkārakavyāpārādakāryātmakaṃ satkāryarūpatāmāpadyate yatsā janiriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11003: nanvekasyaiva bhinnatvamabhinnatvaṃ ca sattvamasattvaṃ ca viruddhamityato yathaikasyaiva bhāvatvamabhāvatvaṃ ca na viruddham /
GSP33nysu__2u:11004: tathaitadapītyādau sambhāvanāṃ tāvadupadarśayannekaikasya bhāvatvamabhāvatvaṃ ca upapādayati- abhāvasyeti sārdhaślokadvayena /
GSP33nysu__2u:11007: niścāyakaṃ kimityato bhedāsattvayoḥ pareṇāpyaṅgīkṛtatvādabhedasattve pramāṇena sādhayati- tasmāditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:11010: “naṣṭānāmapi vastūnāṃ bhedo naiva vinaśyati'; iti yatpradhvastabhedasya sattvamavagamyate yacca ghaṭo jāyate ghaṭaṃ janayatītyanutpannasyāpi
GSP33nysu__2u:11012: tattasmātkāryasya kāraṇābhedātprāgutpattervināśottaraṃ ca sattvādeva hi yujyate /

GSP33nysu__2u:11052: kiñca bhedasya vastusvarūpatve na tatraikatā samaveyāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:11059: nahi ghaṭātpaṭasya bheda itivat ghaṭātpaṭa iti pratītirasti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11060: ghaṭo bhinno ghaṭasya bheda iti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasambandhapratibhāso
GSP33nysu__2u:11062: nahi svayameva svasya viśeṣaṇaṃ sambandhi vā bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11065: tatra yadi dharmiṇamavagāhya tau bhavatastadā tatsvabhāvabhūto bhedo 'pi
GSP33nysu__2u:11068: yadi cāsmadayaṃ bhinna iti pratiyogighaṭitatayā pratīyamāno bhedo vastunaḥ svarūpaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11072: bhedasya tu svarūpatve ye vadanti ca śūnyatām /
GSP33nysu__2u:11079: na laukikeṣvevaṃvidhā dṛśyante nāpi parīkṣakeṣviti yāvat /

GSP33nysu__2u:11082: anyasya pratiyogitve 'pi kathamuktadoṣaparihāra ityata āha- pratiyogino hīti //

GSP33nysu__2u:11095: kiñca bhidyate 'neneti yadi bhedaśabdaḥ karaṇasādhano bhavet tadā bhedaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:11105: bhedasya vastusvarūpatve na tatraikatā samaveyādityapyanenaiva nirastam /

GSP33nysu__2u:11142: evaṃca yadi keṣāñcitparamālpānāṃ vastūnāṃ śūnyasaṃyogādutpattiḥ syāttadā vidāraṇe sati saṃyoganāśena kāryanāśe śūnyāvaśeṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11158: yadā bhididhāturvidāraṇārtho vivakṣitastadā bhedaśabdo vibhāgākhyaguṇavācako na tvanyonyābhāvalakṣaṇabhedavācaka iti /

GSP33nysu__2u:11187: anyathā'tmasvarūpe svayaṃprakāśamāne tatsvarūpamātrāṇāmadvitīyatvānandatvādīnāmapi prakāśanīyamānna jātu kasyacitsaṃśayaviparyayau syātām /

GSP33nysu__2u:11290: kathaṃ svaprakāśatvābhāve sarvajñatābhāva ityata āha- sveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11293: ekameva hīśvarajñānaṃ tacca svavyatiriktameva viṣayīkaroti na tu svarūpamiti kathamīśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:11300: syādayaṃ doṣo yadīśvarasyaikameva jñānaṃ syānna caivam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11311: jñānadvayavānahaṃ, jñānadvayena sarvajño 'smi, idaṃ me jñānametajjñānaviṣayaṃ etaccaitadviṣayamityādireṣa evārtha īśvareṇa jñāyate na vā /

GSP33nysu__2u:11340: yat vastu, na tatsvaprakāśamiti vyāptijñānaṃ svātmānaṃ na viṣayīkaroti

GSP33nysu__2u:11369: ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān vipāpmetyādikā ca sā // MAnuv_2,2.153 //
GSP33nysu__2u:11370: anena”yo 'śanāyāpipāse śokaṃ mohaṃ jarāṃ mṛtyumatyeti'; iti śrutimupādatte /

GSP33nysu__2u:11383: yaḥ sukhī sa duḥkhī bhavatvitīśvarecchāviṣaya eveti niyamānnāyamupādhirityata āha- na ceti
GSP33nysu__2u:11385: īśvarasya hi”ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān'; ityādiśruteḥ sukhitve 'pi
GSP33nysu__2u:11398: tataḥ sukhitve duḥkhitvaprasaṅgo vā nirduḥkhatvānumānaṃ vā bādhakamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11402: siddhe hi śruteḥ svārthapracyāvane tarkānumānayorvyāptisiddhistatsiddhau ca śruteḥ svārthātpracyāvanasiddhiriti
GSP33nysu__2u:11404: śruteḥ svārthaparatve tarkānumānayorvyāptibhaṅgaḥ, sati ca tasmin śruteḥ svārthaparatvamiti
GSP33nysu__2u:11413: āpādyena sādhyena vā sahadarśanaṃ yasyāpādakasya sādhanasya vā tatsahadarśanam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11418: tadā yā hiṃsā sā pāpaheturiti sahadarśanena jyotiṣyomādiśrutyarthāpalāpo
GSP33nysu__2u:11438: aduḥkhitvena cānuktiḥ kathaṃ nopādhitāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_2,2.157ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:11440: kāsau devadattādīnāṃ śrautī duḥkhitvoktirityata āha- aduḥkhamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11441: aduḥkhamitarat sarvaṃ jīvā eva tu duḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11445: evamanumānānugrāhakaṃ tarkaṃ nirākṛtyedānīmīśvaro na sukhī nirduḥkhatvādghaṭavadityanumānamapi dūṣayati- śrutyuktiriti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11449: “ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān'; ityādiśrutiḥ pramāṇaṃ na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11452: nanu śrutiḥ pramāṇameva kintvanumānaviruddhatvātpratītārthaṃ parityajya duḥkhābhāvaparatayā vyākhyātavyetyāśaṅkaya, naivam, anumānasya śrutibādhakatvādarśanāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11456: pūrvoktena prakāreṇa neśvaro dharma eva ca /

GSP33nysu__2u:11583: ato neyaṃ śrutirvyaktaṃ kālasyaiveśvarājjanma pratipādayitumalamityato 'tra spaṣṭāṃ śrutiṃ cāha- udīrayatīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11585: “so 'ntaḥśarīre 'rpitabhūtasūkṣmaḥ kālātmikāṃ śaktimudīrayāṇaḥ'; iti asya īśvarasya vāgapi kālasyeśvarādutpattimāhetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11593: idānīṃ jātastadānīṃ jāta ityadhikaraṇatayā kālasya kāraṇatāvadhāraṇāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:11595: kālasya kālagatvena na virodho 'pi kaścana // MAnuv_2,2.165cd //

GSP33nysu__2u:11621: īśādhīnau ca tau nityaṃ tadādhārau ca tadgatau /

GSP33nysu__2u:11624: syāt kālaḥ sa tadaiveti kālasya svagatatvataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.168 //

GSP33nysu__2u:11633: kevalaṃ śvo ghaṭaṃ sraṣṭāsmītivatkālasṛṣṭiṃ vāñchataḥ parameśvarasyādhikaraṇatayoddeśyaḥ kālaḥ ka iti praśno 'vaśiṣyate /

GSP33nysu__2u:11745: kālakarmaṇī ca te nimitte ca tataḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:11783: yathā mūrtābhāva evākāśaṃ, rūpādaya eva pṛthivyādyāḥ, saṅkhayādayastu guṇāḥ pṛthaganupalambhānna santyeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:11792: arūpā nirviṣayā yā jñānasantatistāmeve mokṣamāhurnānyamityato na pañcaskandhaprakriyābhaṅga iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11793_0: evaṃ vaibhāṣikasautrāntikayoḥ sādhāraṇaṃ matamupanyasyāvāntarabhedaṃ tu nirākaraṇaprastāva eva vivakṣuryattāvaduktaṃ paramāṇusamudāya
GSP33nysu__2u:11793_1: eva goghaṭādiprapañco na tvavayavī kaścidastīti tannirākartuṃ samudāya
GSP33nysu__2u:11794: ubhayahetuke 'pi tadaprāptiriti sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- sa iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11795: ... sa samudāyo hi naikasmādeva yujyate // MAnuv_2,2.175ab //

GSP33nysu__2u:11875: samudāyasya sadātanatve tadvedanamapi kutaḥ kādācitkamityata uktam-
GSP33nysu__2u:11879: samudāyatvavedanasya sāmīpyahetukatā kuta ityata (uktaṃ) āha- anyonyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11902: naca viralānāṃ paramāṇūnāmindriyālambanaviralaparamāṇubhyastadālambanatayā tathātathā sannikṛṣṭāḥ paramāṇavo jāyante /
GSP33nysu__2u:11913: natu kāryaviśeṣeṣu vyāpṛtaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.178ab //

GSP33nysu__2u:11925: saṃyogirūpe grāhyagrāhakarūpe ye arthendriye tayoḥ kāryayoḥ kāraṇatā saṃyogirūpakāraṇatā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11934: tatra yatrādyaḥ kalpo 'ṅgīkriyate tadendriyānālambanebhyo viralaparamāṇubhyastathābhūtā eva paramāṇavo jāyeran /
GSP33nysu__2u:11955: astu tarhyubhayasvabhāvaṃ kāraṇamiti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11958: ato 'niyatyā yatkiñcid yasya kasyāpi kāraṇam // MAnuv_2,2.180ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:11960: aniyatyā ghaṭo ghaṭasyaiva nīlonīlasyaiveti niyatiṃ vinā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11972: nanu ca kāryajananamātraṃ vastunaḥ svabhāva ityaṅgīkurmo na tūkteṣu kamapi pakṣamityata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11988: adṛṣṭamapi viśeṣasya, ādye visadṛśakāryajanakatvasya dvitīya'nyatarapratibandhasya, tṛtīye tūbhayajanakatvasyāpādaṃ kuta
GSP33nysu__2u:11998: tasyaiva kāraṇasya viśeṣāpādakaṃ kuta ityaparaṃ vākyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:12008: ubhaya(trāpi dvi)tra dvitīyau kalpau dūṣayati- yasyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:12011: yadi pūvarpūrvatarādyadṛṣṭasyāpyasti viśeṣāpādakatvaṃ tarhi tadapi pūvarpūrvatarādiparamāṇvādau viśeṣamāpādayedeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:12015: yadi kāraṇamātrasya viśeṣāpādakamadṛṣṭamaṅgīkriyate tadā sarveṣāmapi kāraṇānāṃ viśeṣamupapāditam
GSP33nysu__2u:12022: tantavo yadi sadṛśakāryajananasvabhāvāstadā tantvantarameva janayeyurna tu paṭam /
GSP33nysu__2u:12023: yadi ca visadṛśakāryajananasvabhāvāstadā na tebhyaḥ pārthivapaṭasyotpattiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:12031: sa ca yathā yathopapadyate tathā tathā kalpayiṣyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:12033: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva yatkiñcid yasya kasyacit // MAnuv_2,2.181cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:12036: yatkiñcinnīlādikaṃ yasya kasyacideva pītādeḥ kāryaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:12037: yatkiñcitpītādikaṃ yasya kasyacideva nīlādeḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:12039: nīlā nīlasyaiva kāryaṃ syāt na pītasya /
GSP33nysu__2u:12040: nīlameva nīlasya kāraṇaṃ na pītami(tyatra)tiniyāmakābhāvāditi yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:12044: yadyatra samavetaṃ yadyenākāreṇa pariṇataṃ vā tattasya kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ceti niyāmakasadbhāvena kāyarkāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇe sati tadupapādakakalpanopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:12045: kṣaṇabhaṅgunaye tu pūrvottarakṣaṇayorniranvayavināśotpādayoḥ kāyarkāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇopāya eva nāsti /
GSP33nysu__2u:12048: samavāyapariṇāmayārabhāve 'pi yadyadapekṣayā pūrvabhāvi tadeva tasya kāraṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:12049: yacca yadapekṣayā paścādbhāvi tadeva tasya kāryamityavadhāraṇopapatterniyāmakābhāvo 'siddha ityataḥ kāryaniyamaṃ tāvannirākaroti- idamasyaiveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:12051: iti nityavināśitve kena mānena gamyate // MAnuv_2,2.182b-d //
GSP33nysu__2u:12052: idaṃ nīlama(sya nīla) syaiva kāraṇam, na tu pītasya, ityevaṃ nīlasya nīlakāryatvaṃ, nityavināśitve niranvayavināśotpādapakṣe, kena mānena na
GSP33nysu__2u:12054: paścādbhāvamātrasya nī(lasyeva pītasyāpi)lāpekṣayeva pītāpekṣayāpi sattvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:12058: idaṃ na jāyate 'muṣmādityatrāpi na kāraṇam // MAnuv_2,2.183ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:12059: idaṃ nīlamamuṣmātpītānna jāyate kintu nīlādevetyatra nīlasya kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇe 'pi, kāraṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ, nāsti /
GSP33nysu__2u:12060: nīlasyeva pītasyapi nīlāpekṣayā pūrvabhāvitāyāḥ sattvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:12061: nanu yathā bhavatāṃ samavāyapariṇāmayorabhāve 'pi kuvindapaṭayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇaṃ tathā mamāpi bhaviṣyatītyata āha- idamasyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:12070: evaṃ samudāyaṃ nirākṛtya sarvasya kṣaṇikatāmadhunā pramāṇābhāvena tadvirodhena cāpākartumuttaro granthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:12092: pratyakṣaṃ khalvarthānāṃ vatarmānakālasattāmavagāhate na punaḥ kṣaṇamātrabhāvināvutpattivināśāvapi
GSP33nysu__2u:12095: nanu ca pratyakṣaṃ pūrvottarakṣaṇavatirtvamapyarthasya gṛhṇāti na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:12098: dvitīye tu pratyakṣānupalambhena parvottarakṣaṇayorasattvasiddheḥ kṣaṇikataiva si(dhyediti)ddheti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:12105: kasyācitpratyakṣasya vartamānamātragrāhitve 'pi tadevedamiti pratyabhijñānalakṣaṇasya tadabhāvādityāśayenāha- dṛśyata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:12110: etena na kevalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kṣaṇikatāṃ na gocarayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:12114: sarvavastuṣvityanena saugatānāṃ pratyabhijñānirākaraṇaṃ vaiśeṣikādimatameva spṛśati na tvasmanmatamiti sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:12116: kimanayā pratyabhijñayā nityatvenābhyupagateṣu paramāṇvādiṣu sthiratvaṃ sādhyate kiṃvā ghaṭādiṣu
GSP33nysu__2u:12121: yadā hi ghaṭādau sūcyagrādinaiko 'pi paramāṇurapaiti tadā naṣṭavyameva
GSP33nysu__2u:12125: naca paramāṇuḥ pratyakṣo yena tadapagamānapagamau pratyakṣeṇa śakyaniścayau /
GSP33nysu__2u:12126: naca vācyaṃ nibiḍāvayaveṣu sphaṭikādiṣu pratyabhijñayā sthiratvaṃ setsyatīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:12137: sattve 'pi rūpādisamānameveti śaṅkitaprāmāṇyaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ na kutrāpi sthairyasiddhau pramāṇayituṃ yuktamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:12142: na punaranyadeva bhavatīti hi pariṇāmavādino manyante ataḥ pratyakṣayogyeṣu sarvavastuṣu pratyabhijñayā sthiratvagrahaṇaṃ yuktameveti
GSP33nysu__2u:12148: tadā sāvadhāraṇasya pratyabhijñānasya bhramatve 'pi tadidamiti tu na
GSP33nysu__2u:12151: yadā tu kālādidvayasambandho viṣayastadā sāvadhāraṇamapi na bhrama iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:12152: nanvidaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ parilūnapunarjātakuntalāpādāviva bhrāntaṃ kinna syāditi cet (na)
GSP33nysu__2u:12160: ***[NOTE: jump in verse numbering, no lacuna in text!]***
